title: Igreja Velha
body: In the parish of São Roque do Funchal, there is a place of this name, and there was even an ancient chapel dedicated to S. Roque, which served as a parish church from 1579 to 1790, the year in which it collapsed, already in an advanced state of ruin.

São Roque do Funchal: Parish where the site of the Igreja Velha is located

1579: Start of the period in which the chapel dedicated to S. Roque served as a parish church
